"""Various types related to HTTP and REST."""

from six import PY3

DEnum = object
DIntEnum = object

if PY3:
    import enum
    DEnum = enum.Enum
    DIntEnum = enum.IntEnum


class HttpMethod(DEnum):
    """Enum with HTTP methods."""

    GET = 'GET',
    POST = 'POST',
    PUT = 'PUT',
    PATCH = 'PATCH',
    DELETE = 'DELETE',
    HEAD = 'HEAD',
    OPTIONS = 'OPTIONS'


class HttpStatus(DIntEnum):
    """Enum with HTTP error code classes."""

    INFORMATIONAL_RESPONSE = 1,
    SUCCESS = 2,
    REDIRECTION = 3,
    CLIENT_ERROR = 4,
    SERVER_ERROR = 5,
    ANY = 999  # Same as Ellipsis '...'
    # ...


class HttpResponse(object):
    """Class to represent a HTTP response."""

    def __init__(self, status_code, headers=None, body=None):
        self.status_code = status_code
